file_content.text: Here... take the hull-cracker's detonation codes. Just please--don't hurt me!
Czerka's finished. And CEC's next.
This won't hurt. [Kill Tavar]
I doubt the guards I killed would agree with your rosy assessment.
Don't make me laugh.
Czerka Corellia's under Imperial jurisdiction. Hand over the detonation codes.
On the contrary.
A mild annoyance. Even if the Empire grabs our weapon, it's useless without the proper codes. Tell CEC's board I have the situation under control.
Czerka Corellia will serve the Empire without fail... I promise!
I assure you, gentlemen, Corellian Engineering Corp has nothing to fear. The C-9X droid will serve you well.
Just keep your hull-cracker out of Imperial hands. We hear they've already breached your walls.
Give me the detonation codes, or I'll crush your precious company.
I wouldn't say that.
Your company's in pieces. Show me the detonation codes.
This party's over.
Call me a "mild annoyance" again. I dare you.
I'll break your smug face.
Don't kill me! I'll do anything--whatever you want!
You've got company.
Hold strong, Brall! Better to die free than live under the Empire's fist.
Speak for yourself!
Commander--Brall Tavar is dead. The detonation codes are secure.
You can have a long, healthy career serving the Empire. Just make sure Czerka follows your example.
Join our fight and live.
Anything you say! I'll tell my employees about their new boss.
Commander--Brall Tavar surrendered. I've got the detonation codes.
Good work. Thanks to your earlier assault, my men secured the hull-cracker and prepped it for the blast.
We'll send an officer or two in to deal with Brall and make sure his new loyalty stays firm.
In the meantime, Darth Charnus wants to speak with you aboard the Tears of Taris. He's ready to assault CEC.
I think you're confused.
